articles.title: Taito announces mini arcade cabinet with rotating screen and trackball - The Verge
articles.description: Taito has announced the Egret II Mini, a shrunken down retro arcade cabinet with a rotating screen and several control options. It’ll ship in Japan next year from around $170.
articles.content: The Egret II Mini is coming to Japan next year
